org.texgen.textures
Class ChainedChannelSignal

java.lang.Object
  org.texgen.textures.AbstractChannelSignal
      org.texgen.textures.ChainedChannelSignal
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChannelSignal
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClampSignal, InvertSignal, NoisySignal, SignalBand, SignalPower
public abstract class ChainedChannelSignal
extends AbstractChannelSignal

Helper Channel Signal class that takes another signal as a constructor parameter and then as part of its implementation, uses the value from that signal to construct a final result value.

Author:
Andy Gibson
